rescuecore2.connection
Class ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object

public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class for managing incoming connections.

Method Detail

listen

public void listen(int port,
                   Registry registry,
                   ConnectionManagerListener listener)
            throws java.io.IOException
Listen for connections on a particular port.

Parameters:
port - The port to listen on.
registry - The registry to install in new connections.
listener - A ConnectionManagerListener that will be informed of new connections.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is a problem listening on the port.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shut down this ConnectionManager.

isAlive

public boolean isAlive()
Find out if this ConnectionManager is alive.

Returns:
True if this manager has not been shut down.
